Multiple Facebook posts and tweets from: including a post from the Pakistan Telecommunications Authority (PTA) and a tweet claiming that a report was filed against the app on PM Imran Khan's portal.
The Pakistan Telecommunication Authority: PTA) denied working on a ban of TikTok and stated that they do not deal with apps.
TikTok itself issued a statement denying: stating that they have not received any notice about shutting down TikTok in Pakistan. They also mentioned initiating proceedings against the initial source of the fake news and reserving the right to take further legal action.
